llm_res.rule: The `symbol` function should return the symbol of the token, which is usually a shorter version of the name.
MUST trigger on any successful call to approve(address _spender, uint256 _value).
The `decimals` function should return the number of decimals the token uses. This is optional but usually expected to be implemented to reflect the divisibility of the token.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
